goal.en: To help graduate students to prepare the thesis writing.
goal.ch: To help graduate students to prepare the thesis writing.

content.en: Students are expected to present some recent literature on data assimilation in conjunction with deep learning techniques.
content.ch: Students are expected to present some recent literature on data assimilation in conjunction with deep learning techniques.

textbook.en: 1. Data Assimilation: Methods, Algorithms, and Applications, Asch, Bocquet and Modet, SIAM, 2016. 2. Deep Data Assimilation: Integrating Deep Learning with Data Assimilation Arcucci, Zhu, Hu, Guo, Applied Sciences, 2021
textbook.ch: 1. Data Assimilation: Methods, Algorithms, and Applications, Asch, Bocquet and Modet, SIAM, 2016. 2. Deep Data Assimilation: Integrating Deep Learning with Data Assimilation Arcucci, Zhu, Hu, Guo, Applied Sciences, 2021

method.en: Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

flex_desc.en: Students are encouraged to watch YouTube videos related to data assimilation.
flex_desc.ch: Students are encouraged to watch YouTube videos related to data assimilation.
